document.heading: Ronald “Ron” Austin Memorial Park Designation Act of 2024
To designate the park in Square 3376N as Ronald "Ron" Austin Memorial Park.
document.text: BE IT ENACTED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this act may be cited as the "Ronald "Ron" Austin Memorial Park Designation Act of 2024".

section.text: Pursuant to sections 401 and 422 of the Street and Alley Closing and Acquisition Procedures Act of 1982, effective March 10, 1983 (D.C. Law 4-201; D.C. Official Code §§ 9-204.01, and 9-204.22), the Council designates the park in Square 3376N, as depicted in the plat in the committee report, as "Ronald "Ron" Austin Memorial Park".

codify:street-designation-anno.action: the Council designates the park in Square 3376N, as depicted in the plat in the committee report, as "Ronald "Ron" Austin Memorial Park

section.text: Section 401(7) of the Street and Alley Closing and Acquisition Procedures Act of 1982, effective March 10, 1983 (D.C. Law 4-201; D.C. Official Code §§ 9-204.01(7)), is amended to read as follows:

para.text: This title shall not apply to:
Any street, alley, other public space, or commemorative work not under the jurisdiction of the District of Columbia; or
Any ancillary interior space of a District of Columbia Public Schools building, such as an auditorium or library.

section.heading: Fiscal impact statement.
section.text: The Council adopts the fiscal impact statement in the committee report as the fiscal impact statement required by section 4a of the General Legislative Procedures Act of 1975, approved October 16, 2006 (120 Stat. 2038; D.C. Official Code § 1-301.47a).

section.heading: Effective date.
section.text: This act shall take effect following approval by the Mayor (or in the event of veto by the Mayor, action by the Council to override the veto) and a 30-day period of congressional review as provided in section 602(c)(1) of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act, approved December 24, 1973 (87 Stat. 813; D.C. Official Code § 1-206.02(c)(1)).
